originalText.text: EV Chiropractic is great! The staff is very friendly and is always able to schedule me in a heartbeat. Dr. O worked out a plan for my corrective care that allows me to come regularly, while still being affordable. Been going over a year. My back and neck feel better every time I leave ! Very welcoming place. I've referred a couple of my friends and they agree

originalText.text:
Dr. O and Dr. G are super attentive and honest. I'm only about 5 weeks into treatment and my pain has gone from every day, all day to maybe one "bad day" a week. This is amazing because I've been in horrific pain for nearly eight years. The staff are really friendly, funny, and supportive. I've been accommodated a bunch of times to allow for a flexible schedule.

I also love that my treatments/adjustments are efficient. I've been to other chiropractors before who tried all sorts of techniques and it always took 40 minutes to over an hour per appointment. After my initial consult, my treatments at East Village Chiro are AT MOST 20 minutes long-- you come in, lay down, get adjusted, get on with life.

originalText.text: I've had a great experience at East Village Chiropractic during my treatment.  Dr. O is thorough during the initial exam and he is eager to develop an effective treatment program based on your own physical goals.  Office visits are a breeze, usually receiving an adjustment within 5 minutes of arriving.  Flexible scheduling and the office staff are always friendly.  5 stars!

originalText.text:
I love this Chiropractic office!  Easy going, friendly and they are really good!
The office is busy but they take time with you.  Dr. O didn't just adjust me but looked at x rays of my neck and made a plan for me. I even brought my teenage daughter.
I am really happy I finally tried them after passing the awning for so many years!

originalText.text: I been going to this chiropractic office for few month now and I love the service they provided me with. First of all, within the 3 month I see a great improvement in my spine and posture, Doctor O, provided me with helpful tips on how to maintain a good spinal health. The staff is very professional and very helpful and you don't have to wait long time to be seen. My overall experience is great!
